amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Mentally Ill Offender Treatment and Crime Reduction Act programs by $2 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Dept. of Justice salaries and expenses account by $2 million and increase the Office of Justice state and local law enforcement assistance program by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lujan Grisham (NM) amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 417 - 10 (Roll no. 272).

action.text: Amendment (A021) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham (NM).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lujan Grisham (NM) amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 417 - 10 (Roll no. 272).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
